settings.text:
Shipping information

  • Orders to The Netherlands, placed before 10:00 PM: next day delivery.
  • Orders to Belgium, Germany, and France, placed before 6:00 PM: delivery in 1-2 days.

 

Important to note

  • It is not possible to change your address after placing your order, as it is directly forwarded to our logistics partner.
  • Direct deliveries to post office boxes such as DHL packstation, pickup stations, or bringme boxes are not available.
  • The prices below do not include customs fees, taxes, duties, and any other fees charged at the border; the customer is responsible for those.

 

Netherlands

Cost: Free for orders from €100 and above. €4,95 for orders below €100.

Shipping time: 1-2 days

 

Belgium, Germany, France

Cost: Free for orders from €100 and above. €4,95 for orders below €100.

Shipping time: 1-2 days

 

Austria, Luxembourg

Cost: Free for orders from €100 and above. €4,95 for orders below €100.

Shipping time: 2-3 days

 

Denmark, Czech Republic, Poland, Slovakia, Estonia, Finland, Croatia, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Spain, Greece, Lithuania, Latvia, Monaco, Portugal, Romania, Sweden, and Slovenia

Cost: €9,95

Shipping time: 3-6 days

 

United Kingdom

Cost: £9,95

Shipping time: 3-6 days

 

Norway, Switzerland, Malta, Bulgaria, Cyprus

Cost: €19,95

Shipping time: 3-6 days

 

Rest of the world

Cost: €44,95

Shipping time: 5-14 days
